prompt_ru: Почему он читает эту скучную книгу сейчас?
answer_en: Why is he reading this boring book?
transcription: [waɪ ɪz hi: ˈri:dɪŋ ðɪs ˈbɔ:rɪŋ bʊk?]

answer_en: Is she talking to a stranger?
Are you waiting for her answer?
Is he leaving the city now?
Is he waiting for a train?
Is she having a bath now?
Are you staying at home now?
Why are you eating so little?
Is she playing with a doll?
Are you waiting for the guests?
Is he watching a football match now?
transcription: [ɪz hi: ˈwɒʧɪŋ ə ˈfʊtbɔ:l mæʧ naʊ?]

answer_en: Is she going to work now?
Are you having a bath now?
Are you waiting for the bus?

prompt_ru: Это становится все более и более популярным в наши дни?
answer_en: Is it getting more and more popular nowadays?
transcription: [ɪz ɪt ˈgetɪŋ mɔ: ænd mɔ: ˈpɒpjʊlə ˈnaʊədeɪz?]

answer_en: What song is your sister listening to?
transcription: [wɒt sɒŋ ɪz jɔ: ˈsɪstə ˈlɪsnɪŋ tu:?]

answer_en: Is your mother baking cookies now?
What subject are you studying now?
What things are you discussing now?
Are you waiting for the latest news?
transcription: [ɑ: ju: ˈweɪtɪŋ fɔ: ðə ˈleɪtɪst nju:z?]

answer_en: Are you having a meeting now?
Is the girl playing with a doll?
transcription: [ɪz ðə gɜ:l ˈpleɪɪŋ wɪð ə dɒl?]

answer_en: What song are you listening to?
What kind of songs are you listening to?
transcription: [wɒt kaɪnd ɒv sɒŋz ɑ: ju: ˈlɪsnɪŋ tu:?]

answer_en: Who is your brother waiting for?
What is your sister waiting for?
What music are you listening to?
What radio is she listening to?
Are the kids playing in the garden?
transcription: [ɑ: ðə kɪdz ˈpleɪɪŋ ɪn ðə ˈgɑ:dn?]

answer_en: What is he looking for there?

prompt_ru: Фабрика производит все больше и больше товаров?
answer_en: Is the factory producing more and more goods?
transcription: [ɪz ðə ˈfæktəri prəˈdju:sɪŋ mɔ: ænd mɔ: gʊdz?]

answer_en: Is the factory producing many goods?

prompt_ru: Эта фабрика производит много разных товаров?
answer_en: Is this factory producing many different goods?
transcription: [ɪz ðɪs ˈfæktəri prəˈdju:sɪŋ ˈmeni ˈdɪfrənt gʊdz?]

answer_en: What discipline are you studying now?
Is he having a meeting now?
Are the children playing or reading a book?
transcription: [ɑ: ðə ˈʧɪldrən ˈpleɪɪŋ ɔ: ˈri:dɪŋ ə bʊk?]
